subsection_analysis.refined_text: Diapers and Wipes: For babies or toddlers, pack enough diapers and wipes. • Snacks: Bring a variety of snacks for travel and outings. • Toys and Entertainment: Favorite toys, books, or games. Consider a tablet with pre- downloaded content.
